message.entry: First four arguments must be full matrices of the same data type, either double or single.
When "columns" is specified, the fourth argument must have the same number of rows as the first argument.
When "rows" is specified, the fourth argument must have as many columns as the number of rows in the third argument.
Value of WindowSize must be a positive integer.
Value of AbsoluteTolerance must be a nonnegative real numeric scalar.
Value of RelativeTolerance must be a real numeric scalar in the range of [0 1].
Value of MaxRank must be a positive integer.
Incorrect number of input arguments. Each parameter name must be followed by a corresponding value.
Sizes of first three arguments are incompatible to form a valid SVD.
